subject: Order #SSN3046
description_text:
Hi,
I’ve ordered a set of pedals from you on the 21st of October and I haven’t received them yet. On the shipping details it said 9-15 days so I’m wondering why it’s taking so long as it’s been more than 15 working days now.
Thank you
Chelsea
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 7361 中
